titleStmt.title: A merry wedding: or, O brave Arthur of Bradly. To a pleasant new tune, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for W[illiam]. O[nley]. for A[lexander]. M[ilbourn]. and sold by J[onah]. Deacon, in Guilt-spur-street.,
